Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110329 Firefox/4.2a1pre

Scrolling becomes very slow in the top part of the page. If you scroll past the images on top, where there's only text, the scrolling becomes smooth again.
comments.creator: jbecerra@mozilla.com

comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:2.2a1pre) Gecko/20110329 Firefox/4.2a1pre

Scrolling becomes very slow in the top part of the page. If you scroll past the images on top, where there's only text, the scrolling becomes smooth again.
